text: ettalaku merratan. feimsakum bima`rufin ev tesrihum biihsan. vela yehillu lekum en te'huzu mimma ateytumuhunne sey'en illa ey yehafa ella yukima hudude-llah. fein hiftum ella yukima hudude-llahi fela cunaha `aleyhima fime-ftedet bih. tilke hududu-llahi fela ta`teduha. vemey yete`adde hudude-llahi feulaike humu-zzalimun
